fields.name: Speed up tick speed:
fields.value: Tick speed is sped up, allowing every non head Minecraft role to act twice.(1 use)

fields.name: Farm Cane:
fields.value: The current head gets one sugar

fields.name: Grow Quickly!:
fields.value:
Night or day moves quicker, ending 8 or 16 hours early. People are notified that the sugar cane is growing quickly. You may use this ability during the night or day(1 use)

Attributes
- If you die, the head role gains 2 sugar.
-You may only grow quickly within four hours of night or day starting
